text: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

translation.en: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful, and He will surely make evident the liars
translation.id: Dan sungguh, Kami telah menguji orang-orang sebelum mereka, maka Allah pasti mengetahui orang-orang yang benar dan pasti mengetahui orang-orang yang dusta
